text: Joe Biden's policies have wrecked our economy and taught Americans just how dangerous the Democrats' one-party rule is.I joined @MorningsMaria to discuss inflation supply chain shortages and more:

I've been warning officials for months about the consequences of Putin's invasion and the impact on the global food supply and it's only gotten worse.According to UN experts global grain levels are dangerously low with only a 10-week supply left.
Violence against Justices and their families is always unacceptable.
